outputs.output_descr: In recent years, nearly 20% of UN Volunteer assignments, or well over 1500 assignments per annum, support the mandates and programmes of UN partners in the emergency and protracted humanitarian assistance spectrum. UNV interventions in this area support emergency relief efforts in areas such as humanitarian information gathering, coordination, protection, shelter, food, health, water, sanitation and logistics. In protracted situations, UN Volunteers will offer ongoing support for camp management, reintegration, human rights monitoring, and livelihoods.

project_descr: Fully funded UN Volunteer support to UNV Programme Priority Area 5 (PPA 5) on "Humanitarian Assistance"
